pārśva krāntaiḥ drutāviddhaiḥ sūcī viddhaiḥ tathā eva ca
kalā kāla gataiḥ pādaiḥ āvege yojayet gatim
uttamānām ayam prāyas proktaḥ gati parikramaḥ
madhyānām adhamānām ca gatim vakṣyāmi aham punar
vismaye ca eva harṣe ca vikṣipta pada vikramā

original: āsādya tu rasaṃ hāsyametaccānyaṃ ca yojayet |
analyzed: āsādya tu rasam hāsyam etat ca anyam ca yojayet
tālam atra āhuḥ lakṣya vidaḥ drutena pracāreṇa adhiṣṭhānam gantavye deśe
yasyām iti malla ghaṭī tri aśra ādi vikṛṣṭa patita tve kalā sārdha laghu druta pracāram

original: ityādibahu ca varṣādūrdhvamiti ca niṣedhaḥ phalguphala eva syāt |

tasmāt ekavacana antena eva samāsaḥ na ca
rāmāyaṇa bhārata ādi carita tyāga prasaṅgaḥ kārya grahaṇam hi etad artham

original: muninā kṛtaṃ yatra hi yatraniṣpādyaṃ sañcitaṃ tadeva varṣaṃ gaṇyate
analyzed: muninā kṛtam yatra hi yatra niṣpādyam sañcitam tat eva varṣam gaṇyate

original: varṣāntarāṇi tu tatra vidyamānānyapi avidyamānakalpāni | rāmacarite hi

original: kiñcidduṣyati | tena pañcāṅke nāṭake pañca kāryadinānīti saṃkṣepaḥ

daśa aṅke tu daśa iti vistaraḥ
aṅka chede nimitta antaram api āha yaḥ kaścid kārya vaśāt iti
kārya vaśāt kāryasya tatra āyata tvāt yaḥ puruṣaḥ nāyakaḥ
saḥ uneka yojana vyavahitam adhvānam yadā pratidinam gamanam viśrāntiḥ

original: śayyetyevamādi kathaṃ raṅge pradarśya tadantenāṅkacchedaḥ kāryaḥ |

original: tatastilamātreṇāpyadhikaṃ vācyamasya na labhyate vākyasya | ata evaitat

aṅka antara anusārī saṃkṣepa artham adhikṛtya bindūnām

na uttama madhyama puruṣaiḥ ācaritaḥ na api udātta vacana kṛtaḥ

artha abhidhāna yuktaḥ praveśakaḥ syāt aneka arthaḥ

original: upāyānveṣaṇādi tadabhidhānayuktaḥ praveśako yathā nṛttapā (vā) re

kāryam tu yat ādhikārikam ityādi tasya arthaḥ pañcāṅgasya anuṣṭhānam

original: padairasaṃskṛtaprāyaiḥ khedo bhavati | anena praveśakādau utkalikāprāyaṃ

yatra arthasya samāptiḥ na bhavati aṅke prayoga bāhulyāt
vṛttānta su alpa kathaiḥ praveśakaiḥ saḥ abhidhātavyaḥ
yuddham rājya bhraṃśaḥ maraṇam nagara uparodhanam ca eva
pratyakṣāṇi tu na aṅge praeśakaiḥ saṃvidheyāni

original: iti yaduktaṃ tatrānupapattirbahuprakārā bhavatīti darśayitumāha yavārthasya
analyzed: iti yat uktam tatra anupapattiḥ bahu prakārā bhavati iti darśayitum āha yava arthasya
samāptiḥ iti yat pratyakṣa prayojyam api prayoga vaśāt aṅkesamāptam bhavati

tat ayam atra arthaḥ yata divasa kāryāṇi anekāni tatra tad madhye
yat sundara prayoga aupadeśa upayogi ca tat pratyakṣeṇa darśanīyam anyat sarvam

original: nāstīti nāyaṃ bhedaḥ saṃbhavati vañcanecchābhāve vañcanāyāḥ

original: saṃpattyayogāt | yatra tu dvayorapi na kaścidabhisandhidoṣaḥ kākatālīyena
analyzed: saṃpatti ayogāt yatra tu dvayoḥ api na kaścid abhisandhi doṣaḥ kākatālīyena

yasmin dharma prāpakam ātma hitam bhavati sādhanam bahudhā
vrata niyama tapaḥ yuktaḥ jñeyaḥ asau dharma śṛṅgāraḥ
arthasya icchā yogāt bahudhā ca eva arthataḥ ūrtha śṛṅgāraḥ
strī saṃprayoga viṣayeṣu artha arthā vā ratiḥ yatra
kanyā vilomana kṛtam prāptau strīpuṃsayoḥ tu ramyam vā
nibhṛtam sa āvegam vā yasya bhavet kāma śṛṅgāraḥ
ca prāpte dharma prārthanā rūpam ātma hitam yajña ādi patnī saṃyoga kṛtam
sidhyati iti saṃbandhaḥ anekadhā iti rājya bhūmi go suvarṇa ādi bhedena iti arthaḥ
rati vahu māna ūrtha artham iti yoṣitām puruṣāṇām ca

analyzed: kāma prayuktaḥ eva strī punar atra para strī vivakṣitā yathā śakrasya ahalyā

uṣṇih gāyatrī ādyāni anyāni ca yāni bandha kuṭilāni
vṛttāni samavakāre kavibhiḥ tāni prayojyāni
evam kāryaḥ tad jñaiḥ nānā rasa saṃśrayaḥ samavakāraḥ
vakṣyāmi atas param aham lakṣaṇam īhāmṛgasya api
divya puruṣa āśraya kṛtaḥ divya strī kāraṇa upagata yuddhaḥ

uddhata puruṣa prāyaḥ strī roṣa grathita kāvya bandhaḥ ca

kāryaḥ ḍimaḥ prayatnāt nānā āśraya bhāva sampannaḥ

vyāyogasya tu lakṣaṇam atas param saṃpravakṣyāmi
vyāyogaḥ tu vidhi jñaiḥ kāryaḥ prakhyāta nāyaka śarīraḥ
alpa strī jana yuktaḥ tu eka aha kṛtaḥ tathā ca eva

original: iti ḍiyaḥ uddhatanāyakāsteṣāmātmanāṃ vṛttiryatreti | iko hrasvo'ṅyo

sarva bhāva yukta tvāt iti vṛtta vaicitryam āha
nāṭakāt anantaram ḍima lakṣaṇam yadi api ucitam tathā api
tad gata praveśaka ādi saṃbhava nirākaraṇa artham

original: | aṅkāvatāra eva cātra bhavati | cūlikāṅkamukhayostvatrāpi yuddhādivarṇane

original: tatprasaṅgena ca divyapuruṣasaṃbandhādīhāmṛga uktaḥ tadanantaraṃ ca
analyzed: tad prasaṅgena ca divya puruṣa saṃbandhāt īhāmṛgaḥ uktaḥ tad anantaram ca

vyāyogaḥ tu ḍimasya eva śeṣa bhūtaḥ divyanāyaka abhāvāt kevalam atra udāttasya

original: rājādeḥ nāyakatā api tvamātyasenāpatiprabhṛterdīptarasasya ata evāha
analyzed: rāja ādeḥ nāyaka tā api tu amātya senāpati prabhṛteḥ dīpta rasasya atas eva āha

dvādaśa iti arthaḥ tāvat aṅka parimāṇa śaṅkām atideśāt pratyāsattyā
prasaktām vārayitum āha eka aṅke eva iti
eva kāreṇa eka aha carita viṣaya tvāt nyāya prāptam eva atra ekāṅka tvam iti āha

original: bahavaśca tatra puruṣā vyāyacchante yathā samavakāre |
analyzed: bahavaḥ ca tatra puruṣāḥ vyāyacchante yathā samavakāre
na ca tad pramāṇa yuktaḥ kāryaḥ tu ekāṅkaḥ eva ayam
na ca divya nāyaka kṛtaḥ kāryaḥ rāja ṛṣi nāyaka nibaddhaḥ
yuddha niyuddha ādharṣaṇa saṃgharṣa kṛtaḥ ca kartavyaḥ
evaṃvidhaḥ tu kāryaḥ vyāyogaḥ kāvya rasa yoniḥ
vakṣyāmi atas param aham lakṣaṇam utsṛṣṭika aṅkasya
prakhyāta vastu viṣayaḥ tu aprakhyātaḥ kadācid eva syāt
divya puruṣaiḥ viyuktaḥ śeṣaiḥ yuktaḥ bhavet puṃbhiḥ

original: rapi tatra kathaṃ | tasmāttatra sāttvatyeva vṛttiḥ | yadi bāhulyāpekṣayā
analyzed: tatra katham tasmāt tatra sāttvatī eva vṛttiḥ yadi bāhulya apekṣayā
vṛtti mayam kāvyam iti vyavahāraḥ rūpaka samudāya apekṣayā
khaṇḍasya avṛttika tve pi samuditasya rūpakasya vṛtti maya tvāt
yat śakalība ṛgha mata anusāriṇaḥ mūrchā ādau ātma saṃvitti lakṣaṇām
pañcamīm vṛttim sakala kārya nivṛtti anumeyām mūrchā karma anubhāvena ca

original: phalenāvacchinnāmātmavyāpārarūpāṃ manyante na ca parispanda evaiko
analyzed: phalena avacchinnām ātma vyāpāra rūpām manyante na ca parispandaḥ
vyāpāraḥ iti manasikṛtya tat matam bhāvānām
vāhya grahaṇa svabhāva tvam upapādayadbhiḥ bhaṭṭa lollaṭa prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: parākṛtamiti na phalavṛttirvā kāciditi catasra eva vṛttayaḥ (iti) |
analyzed: parākṛtam iti na phala vṛttiḥ vā kācid iti catasraḥ eva vṛttayaḥ iti

original: vayantu brūmaḥ | ko'yamasthānasantrāsaḥ | yatkiñcidiha nāṭye samasti
analyzed: vayantu brūmaḥ kaḥ yam asthāna santrāsaḥ yat kiñcid iha nāṭye samasti

original: taccedvṛttiṣvantarbhāvyaṃ tadābhavaidetat - na caivam | raṅgo hi nāma kā vṛttiḥ
analyzed: tat ced vṛttiṣu antar bhāvyam tadā abhavait etat na ca evam raṅgaḥ hi nāma kā vṛttiḥ

original: mṛdaṅgapaṇavavaṃśādyā kā vṛttirapi hi bhavet | tasmādvyāpāraḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga paṇava vaṃśa ādyā kā vṛttiḥ api hi bhavet tasmāt vyāpāraḥ

original: pumarthasādhako vṛttiḥ sa ca sarvatraiva varṇyata ityato vṛttayaḥ kāvyasya
analyzed: pumartha sādhakaḥ vṛttiḥ sa ca sarvatra eva varṇyate iti atas vṛttayaḥ kāvyasya

original: mātṛkā iti na hi kiñcidvyāpāraśūnyaṃ varṇanīyamasti |
analyzed: mātṛkā iti na hi kiñcid vyāpāra śūnyam varṇanīyam asti
mada mūrchā ādi varṇa anāyām api manaḥ vyāpārasya sāttvatya ākhyasya saṃbhavāt
karuṇa dau api ca manaḥ deha vyāpāra saṃbhave pi bāhulyena
vāc vyāpāra saṃbhavāt bhāratī vṛttiḥ ucyate vṛtti antara niṣedhaḥ tu
tad aṅgānām aparipūrṇa tvāt na ca kāya vāc manasa vyāpāram tad vaicitryam
vā antareṇa anyaḥ kaścid vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati iti asakṛt uktam
tasmāt karuṇa pradhāne bhāratī vṛttiḥ paridevita bāhulyāt

original: yattu śṛṅgārahāsyakaruṇairiha kaiśikī syāt iti kohalenoktaṃ
analyzed: yat tu śṛṅgāra hāsya karuṇaiḥ iha kaiśikī syāt iti kohalena uktam

original: tanmunimatavirodhādupekṣyameva tasya tu yatra yatrānulbaṇā cittavṛttiḥ sā sā
analyzed: tat muni mata virodhāt upekṣyam eva tasya tu yatra yatra anulbaṇā citta vṛttiḥ sā sā
kaiśikī iti āśayaḥ evam prahasana bhāṇayoḥ api vāc vyāpāra prādhānyāt eva

original: bhāratīvṛttiḥ mūrchādau tu vyāpārābhāve vṛttyabhāva eva | na hi sarvaṃ

analyzed: nāṭyam vṛtti brahma tayā samarthanīyam iti alam ati prasaktyā
atha sarva ante sarva rasa maya tvāt avita svabhāva tvāt ca saṃkṣepeṇa
śakya vyutpatti dāyinī tvena pradhāna bhūta tvāt tad aṅgānām ca
nāṭikā ādi bhāṇa anta sa

vīthī syāt eka aṅkā tathā ekahāryā dvihāryā vā
adhama uttama madhyābhiḥ yuktā syāt prakṛtibhiḥ trisṛbhiḥ
udghātyaka avalagita avaspandita nālya sat pralāpāḥ ca
vākkelī atha prapañcaḥ mṛdavādhi bale chalam trigatam
vyāhāraḥ gaṇḍaḥ ca trayodaśa aṅgāni udāhṛtāni asyāḥ
atha vīthī saṃproktā lakṣaṇam eṣām pravakṣyāmi
padāni tu agata arthāni ye narāḥ punar ādarāt
yojayanti padaiḥ anyaiḥ tat uddhātyakam ucyate
masta rūpaka upajīvya tvāt vīthīm lakṣayati
eka hāryaiḥ iti ākāśa puruṣa bhāṣitaiḥ iti arthaḥ dvi hārya iti
ukti pratyukti vicitryeṇa iti arthaḥ aṅgāni uddiśati
udghātyaka avalagita avaspandita nālya sat pralāpāḥ ca

vyāhāraḥ gaṇḍaḥ ca trayodaśa aṅgāni udāhṛtāni iti

original: ityudāharaṇamātrametaditi yāvat | etāni krameṇa lakṣayati padāni
analyzed: iti udāharaṇa mātram etat iti yāvat etāni krameṇa lakṣayati padāni
tu a gata arthāni iti
p
yatra anyasmin samāveśya kāryam anyat prasādhyate
tat ca avalagitam nāma vijñeyam nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
nanu eṣām ukti vaicitrya rūpa tvam ced lakṣaṇa alaṅkāra ādibhyaḥ kaḥ bheda
iti vṛtta upakaraṇa rūpa tve tu sandhi aṅgebhyaḥ katham anyatas rasa upakaraṇa tāyām
vṛttyaṅgeṣu antarbhāvaḥ na ca etat vyatiriktam eṣām sāmānya lakṣaṇam asti
tatra kecid ukta lakṣaṇa ādi viśeṣa rūpa tvam eva eṣām pratipannāḥ vivecakāḥ tu
tad vyatirktāni eva etāni iti āhuḥ
tathā hi praśna prativacanayā ārenya abhiprāya rūpeṇa yogena yat vaicitryam
tad vīthi aṅgam atas eva udāhṛtāni iti eṣām sāmānya alakṣaṇam udāhṛtāni

original: prativacanānītyarthaḥ | tāni ca sarvāṇi prativacanaśūnyasya kāvyasyābhāvāt
analyzed: prativacanāni iti arthaḥ tāni ca sarvāṇi prativacana śūnyasya kāvyasya abhāvāt

original: tena vicitrāṇīti labhyante | ata eva vīthī paṅktiranyottarāsahiṣṇutvāt
analyzed: tena vicitrāṇi iti labhyante atas eva vīthī paṅktiḥ anya uttara a sahiṣṇu tvāt
vicitra ukti pratyukti garbha tvāt lakṣaṇa alaṅkāra ādīnām tu na ukti niyatam rūpam iti

original: viśeṣaḥ | tatra yadā vivakṣitamuttaraṃ dātuṃ śakto.yaṃ syāditi yanmama
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ tatra yadā vivakṣitam uttaram dātum śaktaḥ iyam syāt iti yat mama

original: manasi vartate tadeva vakti navetyevamādinā nimittena yadā praṣṭaiva prativacanaṃ
analyzed: manasi vartate tat eva vakti na vā iti evamādinā nimittena yadā praṣṭā eva prativacanam
vaicitryam abhisandhāya pṛcchati pratipakta ucitam abhidhatte tadā

original: taduttaramudghātyakam | praśnātmake udghāte sādhviti yat tatrājñātārthe kan |
analyzed: tad uttaram udghātyakam praśna ātmake udghāte sādhu iti yat tatra ajñāta arthe kan
padāni artha gatāni praśna rūpāṇi ādarāt kṛtāni paryāyaiḥ
pada antaraiḥ uttara rūpaiḥ narāḥ sudhiyaḥ yojayanti
tad uttara pada samūha ātmakam udghātyakam yathā pāṇḍava ānande

original: kā bhūṣā balināṃ kṣamā paribhavaḥ ko'yaṃ sakulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: kā bhūṣā balinām kṣamā paribhavaḥ kā uyam sakulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ

original: kiṃ duḥkhaṃ parasaṃśrayo jagati kaḥ ślāghyo ya āśrīyate |
analyzed: kim duḥkham para saṃśrayaḥ jagati kaḥ ślāghyaḥ yaḥ āśrīyate

original: ko mṛtyurvyasanaṃ śucaṃ jahati ke yairnirjitāḥ śatravaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ mṛtyuḥ vyasanam śucam jahati ke yaiḥ nirjitāḥ śatravaḥ
kaiḥ vijñātam idam virāṭa nagare channa sthitaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ
yatra anyasmin iti yatra uttare dīyamāne anya anusandhāna pūrvake api anyat kāryam

original: sidhyati tadānyakāryāvalaganādavalagitam | yathā avi suhā-adi de lo-aṇāṇāmiti
analyzed: sidhyati tadā anya kārya avalaganāt avalagitam yathā avi de loaṇāṇām iti

original: vidūṣakeṇa pṛṣṭe (rājñaḥ) sukhayatīti kimucyate iti kṛcchreṇoruyuga
analyzed: vidūṣakeṇa pṛṣṭe rājñaḥ sukhayati iti kim ucyate iti kṛcchreṇa ūru yuga
m ityādi uttaram vasantaka pratyāyana uddeśena pravṛttam api
sāgarikā āgatam āsthāva
p
ākṣipta irthe tu kasmin ścit śubha aśubha samutthite
kauśalāt ucyate nyorthaḥ tat avaspanditam bhavet
hāsyena upagata artha prahelikā nālikā iti vijñeyā
mūrkha jana sannikarṣe hitam api yatra prabhāṣate vidvān
mukhyam śṛṅgāra ākhyam kāryam sādhayati iti

original: ākṣipte tviti | śubhāśubhaṃ daivaṃ tenābuddhipūrvakaṃ kutracicarthe
analyzed: ākṣipte tu iti śubha aśubham daivam tena abuddhi pūrvakam kutracid arthe
ākṣipte api kauśalāt tat tat pracchādana icchayā yatra uttaraḥ nyaḥ ṛthaḥ ucyate
tat avaspanditam cakṣuḥ spandana ādi vat antargata sūcanīya saṃbhavāt yathā
sat pakṣāḥ madhura giraḥ prasādhita āśāḥ mada uddhata ārambhāḥ
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kāla vaśāt medinī pṛṣṭhe

original: atra diavavaśādayamartha āyātaḥ satpakṣe amadhurāgīryeṣānte tathā
analyzed: atra diava vaśāt ayam arthaḥ āyātaḥ sat pakṣe tathā

original: prakarṣeṇa sādhitāḥ ādhisahitāḥ yairdiśaḥ kṛtāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭrātmajāḥ
analyzed: prakarṣeṇa sādhitāḥ ādhi sahitāḥ yaiḥ diśaḥ kṛtāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra ātmajāḥ

original: patantīti | tatrottaraṃ pratihatamamaṅgalam | punaḥ sūtradhāraḥ nanu
analyzed: patanti iti tatra uttaram pratihatam amaṅgalam punar sūtradhāraḥ nanu

original: śaratsamayavarṇanayā haṃsā nabhastalaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrā iti vyapadiśāmītyādi
analyzed: śarad samaya varṇanayā haṃsāḥ nabhastalam dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ iti vyapadiśāmi ityādi

original: avaspanditatvameva sūcayati na khalu na jāne kintvamaṅgalatvāt śaṅkitameva me
analyzed: avaspandita tvam eva sūcayati na khalu na jāne kintu amaṅgala tvāt śaṅkitam eva me
hṛdayam iti

original: hāsyenopagatārtheti prahelikā paravitāraṇakāri yaduttaraṃ ata eva hāsyayuktā
analyzed: hāsyena upagata arthā iti prahelikā para vitāraṇa kāri yat uttaram atas eva hāsya yuktā

original: sā nālikā praṇālikā vyājetyarthaḥ | prakarṣeṇa helikā narmādikrīḍārūpaṃ
analyzed: sā nālikā praṇālikā vyāja iti arthaḥ prakarṣeṇa helikā narma ādi krīḍā rūpam

original: yasyāḥ sā prahelikā | yathā - susaṃgatā jasya kide tumaṃ ā adā so ettha evva
analyzed: yasyāḥ sā prahelikā yathā su saṃgatā tumam ā adā saḥ ettha evva

original: ciṭṭhadi | sāgarikā sahi kassa kide | susaṅgatā (sahāsam) a i appasaṅkīdeṇaṃ
analyzed: ciṭṭhadi sāgarikā sahi kassa kide

original: cittaphala assa | anayā bhaṅgyā ācchāditaṃ ca garbhagataṃ cāsya vastviti |
analyzed: citta phala assa anayā bhaṅgyā ācchāditam ca garbha gatam ca asya vastu iti

original: mūrkhajanasannikarṣa iti yaduttaraṃ mūrkhaṃ prati vastuto hitamapi
analyzed: mūrkha jana sannikarṣaḥ iti yat uttaram mūrkham prati vastutas hitam api

original: śabdacchalādyathā priyaṃ tādṛśaṃ ca mūrkhaiḥ priyāṃśena na tu
analyzed: śabda chalāt yathā priyam tādṛśam ca mūrkhaiḥ priya aṃśena na tu
hita aṃśena tathābhūta bhaṅgībhūta

na ca gṛhyate isya vacanam vijñeya usat pralāpaḥ usau
eka dvi prativacanā vākkelī syāt prayoge smin

original: yadasadbhūtaṃ vacanaṃ saṃstavayuktaṃ dvayoḥ parasparaṃ yattu ||
analyzed: yat asat bhūtam vacanam saṃstava yuktam dvayoḥ parasparam yat tu

original: ekasya cārthahetoḥ sa hāsyajananaḥ prapañcaḥ syāt |
analyzed: ekasya ca artha hetoḥ sa hāsya jananaḥ prapañcaḥ syāt

original: dvayāśrayaṇaṃ ca siddhattvātkaroti | evaṃ hi tātkālikaḥ kopo'pi rakṣito bhavati
analyzed: dvaya āśrayaṇam ca evam hi tātkālikaḥ kopaḥ api rakṣitaḥ bhavati
priya abhidhāyi tvāt kāla antara saṃbhāvyaḥ ca yathārtha abhidhāyi tvāt

original: yathāvyasaninā rājaputreṇa kiṃsukhamiti pṛṣṭhe tenottaraṃ dīyate -
analyzed: yathā vyasaninā rāja putreṇa kiṃsukham iti pṛṣṭhe tena uttaram dīyate
sarvathā yaḥ ukṣa vijayī surā sevana tatparaḥ
tasya arthānām sukhānām ca samṛddhiḥ kara gāminī
asataḥ usādhu bhūtasya vastunaḥ pralapanam asmin iti asat pralāpaḥ iti
eka dvi prativacanā iti ekam dvayoḥ prativacanam asyām
dvi grahaṇam aneka upalakṣaṇam tat amunā sarva praśna uttara vargaḥ svīkṛtaḥ yathā
nadīnām megha vigame kā śobhā pratibhāsate
bāhya antarāḥ vijetavyāḥ ke nāma kṛtinā ūrayaḥ

original: yadasadbhūtamiti yathā ratnāvalyām susaṅgate kathamahamihastho bhavatyā
analyzed: yat asat bhūtam iti yathā ratnāvalyām su saṅgate katham aham ihasthaḥ bhavatyā

original: jñāta iti rājanyuktavati susaṅgatayocyate ṇa kevalaṃ bhaṭṭā cittapalaheṇa tā
analyzed: jñātaḥ iti rājani uktavati su saṅgatayā ucyate ṇa kevalam bhaṭṭā citta palaheṇa tā

original: devī e ṇiveda issaṃ ityādau ābharaṇadānaparyante prapañcaḥ | tathāhi - dvayoḥ
analyzed: devī ityādau ābharaṇa dāna paryante prapañcaḥ tathā hi dvayoḥ
rāja vidūṣakayoḥ
paraspara saṃbandham āśritya asatyam devyai nivedayāmi iti uktam

original: saṃstavaśca tatrāsti bhaṭṭiṇo pasādeṇa kimidaṃ ma e iti hāsyamapi
analyzed: saṃstavaḥ ca tatra asti bhaṭṭiṇo pasādeṇa kim idam me iti hāsyam api

original: parihāsarūpaṃ vidyate | ekasya ca rājño'rthe prayojane sāgarikāsaṅgame
analyzed: parihāsa rūpam vidyate ekasya ca rājñaḥ ūrthe prayojane sāgarikā saṅgame
hetuḥ bhavati eva iti anyathā abhidhānāt prapañcaḥ

yat kāraṇāt guṇānām doṣīkaraṇam bhavet vivāda kṛtam
doṣa guṇīkaraṇam vā tat mṛdavam nāma vijñeyam
paravacanam ātmanaḥ ca uttara uttara samudbhavam dvayoḥ yat tu
anyonya artha viśeṣakam adhibalam iti tat budhaiḥ jñeyam
anya artham eva vākyam chalam abhisandhāna hāsya roṣa karam

original: yatkāraṇāditi guṇānāṃ doṣatvaṃ doṣāṇāṃ vā guṇatvaṃ yatra kriyate
analyzed: yatkāraṇāt iti guṇānām doṣa tvam doṣāṇām vā guṇa tvam yatra kriyate
tat mṛdavam vivāda kṛtam iti anena lakṣaṇāt viśeṣam āha idam vṛtti antaram

original: svabhāvamityarthaḥ yathā śiraḥ śvā kāko vā drupadatanayo vā parimṛśet
analyzed: svabhāvam iti arthaḥ yathā śiraḥ śvā kākaḥ vā drupada tanayaḥ vā parimṛśet

original: (veṇī 3) ityatra doṣasya guṇīkaraṇaṃ vivādākarṇanena saha yadi
analyzed: veṇī iti atra doṣasya guṇīkaraṇam vivāda ākarṇanena saha yadi
śastram ujjñitam aśastra pāṇayaḥ iti atra karṇa vacanena
pratijñāta paripālanasya guṇasya api doṣīkaraṇam vivāda kṛtam eva mṛdavam iti
mardanam mṛd parapakṣa mardanena sva pakṣam avati rakṣati iti
para vacanam ātmanaḥ ca iti parasya vacanam ātmanaḥ ca vacanam
parasparam artha viśeṣa lābhaḥ yatra bhavati iti uttarottarasya adhika adhikasya arthasya

original: samudbhavo yatra tadadhibalam | etaduktaṃ bhavati - yatroktipratyuktikrame
analyzed: samudbhavaḥ yatra tat adhibalam etat uktam bhavati yatra ukti pratyukti krame
kriyamāṇe
paraspara prajñāna upajīvana balāt sva pakṣa su ghaṭitāt adhibala saṃbandhāt adhibala

original: m | yathā nāgānande rāgasyāspadamityavai mītyādita ārabhya vidūṣakeṇa
analyzed: yathā nāgānande rāgasya āspadam iti avai mī iti āditas ārabhya vidūṣakeṇa

original: sahoktikrameṇa svapakṣo draḍhimānamānīto yāvadāha nanu śarīrataḥ
analyzed: saha ukti krameṇa sva pakṣaḥ draḍhimānam ānītaḥ yāvat āha nanu śarīrataḥ
prabhṛti sarvam eva mayā para artham pratipālyate iti
anya artham eva vākyam iti yat vākyam prayojana antaram uddiśya
vacanam ucyamānam kasyacid vacanam anyasya hāsyam aparasya roṣam janayati
tacchalam yathā

original: kassa va ṇa ho-i roso daṭṭhūṇa pi ā e savvaṇaṃ aharam |
analyzed: kassa va ṇa hoi rosaḥ daṭṭhūṇa pi ā e savvaṇam

original: sabbhamarapadumaghā iri vāri avāme sahasu ehṇim ||
analyzed: sabbha marapadumaghā iri vāri avāme sahasu ehṇim

śruti sārūpya ādyasmin bahavaḥ ṛthāḥ yuktibhiḥ niyujyante
yat hāsyam ahāsyam vā tat trigatam nāma vijñeyam
pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ uktaḥ vyāhāraḥ hāsya leśa arthaḥ
saṃrambha saṃbhrama yutam vivāda yuktam tathā apavāda kṛtam
bahuvacana ākṣepa kṛtam gaṇḍam pravadanti tattva jñāḥ
etat vacanam sakhī saṃbandhi bhartṛ pratyāyanam prayojanam uddiśya prayuktam

original: tasya patnyā api saṃbandhināṃ chalaṃ vidagdhajanasya hāsyaṃ sapatnyā
analyzed: tasya patnyāḥ api saṃbandhinām chalam vidagdha janasya hāsyam sapatnyā
vacanam roṣam janayati

original: śrutisārūpyāditi śabdasārūpyād bahava iti praśnaprativacanasya svabhāvā
analyzed: śruti sārūpyāt iti śabda sārūpyāt bahavaḥ iti praśna prativacanasya svabhāvāḥ
yatra niyujyante yuktibhiḥ iti kākka ādīnām tathā eva upapattibhiḥ
tri śabda ūneka upalakṣaṇam anekam artham gatam iti trigatam vākye

original: mukhyamuttaramanekapraśnasādhāraṇam | iha tu ya eva praśnastadeva
analyzed: mukhyam uttaram aneka praśna sādhāraṇam iha tu yaḥ eva praśnaḥ tat eva
